archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Identity
archimate:Principle.documentation: The subset of Sovrin Identity Data shared by a Sovrin Entity in the context of a specific Connection (Pairwise) or publicly in the context of the Sovrin Ledger (Anywise). To respect privacy, a Sovrin Entity may have as many Sovrin Identities as needed to maintain their desired separation of contexts. See Appendix A.
